Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to enact S.3514 and A.7369 of 2009, which authorize political subdivisions to award public competitively bid contracts to businesses that participate in programs designed to foster participation by small local businesses in public procurement at a cost premium not to exceed ten percent of the lowest bid.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Authorize political subdivisions to award public competitively bid contracts to businesses that participate in programs designed to foster participation by small local businesses. (S.3514/A.7369)

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to enact S.3514 and A.7369 of 2009, which authorize political subdivisions to award public competitively bid contracts to businesses that participate in programs designed to foster participation by small local businesses in public procurement at a cost premium not to exceed ten percent of the lowest bid.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Authorize political subdivisions to award public competitively bid contracts to businesses that participate in programs designed to foster participation by small local businesses. (S.3514/A.7369)
